title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a REST API with one CLI command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node + browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama as an LLM or embed provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats via Ollama with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to expose Ollama models in channels/DMs.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module wrapper for the Ollama JS client with decorators.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node-selector support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks: CPU/GPU, Open-WebUI, RAG, Grafana.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single script.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes or generate text via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama for scalable inference.
